Pref.label: Power plant Power Generation (in megawatts)
Pref.description: (Pref) This is the how much power is expected to be consumed from the nuclear power plant.

Ts.label: Sampling period
Ts.description: (Ts) The Sampling period. Has to macth the TinyOS WCPS simulation sampling period.

h.label: Sampling period*
h.description: (h) The Sampling period extra parameter. The same as above.

Tfinal.label: Total Simulation time (in seconds)
Tfinal.description: (Tfinal) The simulation execution time in seconds.

wref.label: Power filter frequency gain
wref.description: (wref) Affects how the power plant power changes at each time step.

rhoh.label: Hot side fluid density
rhoh.description: (rhoh) Affects the the model's hot side fluid density.

Vh.label: Hot side fluid volume
Vh.description: (Vh) Affects the the model's hot side fluid volume.

ch.label: Hot side specific fluid density
ch.description: (ch) Affects the model's hot side specifc fluid density.

mdoth.label: Hot side fluid mass flow rate
mdoth.description: (mdoth) Affects the model's hot side fluid mass flow rate.

hh.label: Hot side transfer heat coefficient
hh.description: (hh) Affects the model's hot side transfer heat coefficient.

Thi.label: Hot leg temperature input
Thi.description: (Thi) Affects the model's hot leg temperature input.

rhoc.label: Cold side fluid density
rhoc.description: (rhoc) Affects the the model's cold side fluid density.

Vc.label: Cold side fluid volume
Vc.description: (Vc) Affects the the model's cold side fluid volume.

cc.label: Cold side specific fluid density
cc.description: (cc) Affects the model's cold side specifc fluid density.

mdotc.label: Cold side fluid mass flow rate
mdotc.description: (mdotc) Affects the model's cold side fluid mass flow rate.

hc.label: Cold side transfer heat coefficient
hc.description: (hc) Affects the model's cold side transfer heat coefficient.

Tci.label: Cold leg temperature input
Tci.description: (Tci) Affects the model's cold leg temperature input.

rhow.label: Wall side fluid density
rhow.description: (rhow) Affects the the model's wall side fluid density.

Vw.label: Wall side Fluid Volume
Vw.description: (Vw) Affects the the model's wall side fluid volume.

cw.label: Wall side specific Fluid Density
cw.description: (cw) Affects the model's wall side specifc fluid density.

A.label: Heat exchange area
A.description: (A) Surface area of the heat exhanger.

wp.label: Pump frequency*
wp.description: (wp) Frequency for the pump dynamics. Model depency constant. Used in the covariance initial condition state matrix calculation.

wa.label: Hot leg mass flow rate*
wa.description: (wa) Frequency for the hot leg mass flow rate dynamics. Used in the covariance initial condition state matrix calculation.

wb.label: Hot Leg temperature frequency input*
wb.description: (wb) Frequency for the hot leg temperature input dynamics. Used in the covariance initial condition state matrix calculation.

Sw_tc.label: Process Cold Leg ns density
Sw_tc.description: (Sw_tc) Process ns (noise spectro) density for the cold leg temperature input.

Sw_mh.label: Process Hot Mass spectro density flow rate
Sw_mh.description: (Sw_mh) Process ns (noise spectro) density for the hot mass flow rate.

Sw_th.label: Process Hot Leg ns temperture input
Sw_th.description: (Sw_th) Process ns (noise spectro) density for the hot leg temperature input.

Sv_thi.label: Sensor Hot Leg ns temperature input
Sv_thi.description: (Sv_thi) Sensor ns (noise spectro) density for the hot leg temperature input.

Sv_tho.label: Sensor Hot Leg ns temperature output
Sv_tho.description: (Sv_tho) Sensor ns (noise spectro) density for the hot leg temperature ouput.

Sv_mh.label: Sensor Hot Mass ns density flow rate
Sv_mh.description: (Sv_mh) Sensor ns (noise spectro) density for the hot leg mass flow rate.

x0.label: Steady state initial condition parameters
x0.description: (xo) Steady state initial condition parameter. [hot leg output - cold leg out - wall temp output - hot leg mass flow rate - hot leg temp input - pump output]
